Question
========

Suppose it is given that the weight of Dutch men over the age of 25 years is normally distributed with μ = 81 and σ = 9.We draw from this population at random a person. How heavy should this man be at most to belong to the lightest 10% of the population?

Answerlist
----------

* 92.5 kg
* 66.2 kg
* 69.5 kg
* 63.4 kg

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 92.5 kg: Incorrect
* 66.2 kg: Incorrect
* 69.5 kg: Correct
* 63.4 kg: Incorrect
